scenario: BlackRock Inc. recently sent transparency notifications to Syensqo indicating that it crossed the threshold of 3% in voting rights. The notifications detail the equivalent financial instruments and total voting rights after each transaction. The latest notification, dated December 30, 2024, states that BlackRock Inc. crossed the 3% threshold downwards. The denominator for the calculation is 105,032,929. The disclosure obligation arose due to voting rights attached to shares for BlackRock, Inc. going below 3%.
